name: Borrow Combat_Pro RPG
description:
WASD to move

Left mouse button Normal attack

ESC to pause the game

Tab to lock the camera to enemy

Q borrow the enemy's ability (there is a time limit, but can be stored through ordinary attacks) after borrowing can last 5s, after borrowing the damage of the general attack rose, and get a new skill press E can shoot spells (need to continue to cast 1s, movement will interrupt) to deal significant damage. A purple ball will surround the buff duration of the character.
